reviewText: An amazing film from an important era.

This filmmaker is too little known. I know very little about him, but this is clearly an important work. if you are interested or cared about the 60s and where we were and where we are going, this film may be for you.

This classic dive into verite subversion is finally out. Nice DVD over all. A simple, handsome, and not-too-expensive double disc set. Definitely recommended to anyone interested in Robert Kramer, possibly one of the world's best and least acknowledged filmmakers.
